ingredients: ½ red bell pepper, cut into strips
½ green bell pepper, cut into strips (optional)
Optional toppings: salsa, guacamole, cilantro, limes
instructions: Heat oil in a pan over medium heat.
Add onion and bell peppers to the pan and cook until softened.
Lay out a tortilla and sprinkle half of it with cheese.
Cook in a warm non-stick pan, fold-side down, for 2-3 minutes, or until browned and the cheese is melted.
Flip and cook for another 2-3 minutes.
cooking_tips: Use a variety of bell peppers for more color and flavor.
Don't overcrowd the pan when cooking the vegetables.
For a crispier quesadilla, use a little more oil and cook over medium-high heat.
